name: Planet Runners
description:
Race through the galaxy and become one of the best Planet Runners in this cute and chaotic multiplayer game with innovative controls.

-

ULTRA MEGA SIMPLE CONTROLS
Experience the innovative 3 button control scheme. Enjoy blazing through platforms with fluid movement and unleash crazy ultimate abilities with a single tap!

CASUAL YET COMPETITIVE
With an average time of 1-2 minutes per race, you can either be a casual player or a binge-playing competitive runner extravaganza!

DIVERSE CHARACTER ROSTER
Race with absurdly weird runners utilizing distinctive ultimate abilities and totally nonsense backstories. Unlock 100+ skins and player icons!

VARIOUS PLANETS
Enjoy an ever-expanding variety of race tracks on unique planets!

UNFORGIVING SOUNDTRACK
Enjoy an unforgiving soundtrack that fuels you!

3D SOUND EFFECTS
Enjoy Virtual 3D sound effects! Headphones *strongly* recommended.

TASTY DESIGN
Heart melting old-school aesthetic with a retro user interface inspired by early '90s operating systems.

PRIVATE GAMES
No pending invites, no friend list! Just create a room and share the 5-digit code with your friends! We've implemented a native iOS solution so you don't even need to leave the game to send invitations.

-

iPhone 6 / iPod Touch 6 / iPad mini 2 / iPad Air 2 or later recommended.
